unnormalised: **Automotive Buzz: New Traffic Rules Got You Sweating?**
normalised: **Automotive Buzz: New Traffic Rules Got You Sweating?**

unnormalised: Okay folks, time to buckle up (literally!) because Chennai’s traffic police just dropped some new regulations faster than you can say "filter coffee." Apparently, riding without a helmet now comes with a hefty fine – we're talking Rs. 2000, which is basically a month's worth of biryani cravings!
normalised: Okay folks, time to buckle up (literally!) because Chennai’s traffic police just dropped some new regulations faster than you can say "filter coffee." Apparently, riding without a helmet now comes with a hefty fine – we're talking rupee two thousand, which is basically a month's worth of biryani cravings!

unnormalised: And it's not just two-wheelers. New rules are clamping down on reckless driving too. Speeding in Mumbai will now cost you Rs. 5000, with repeat offenders facing license suspensions. Imagine trying to navigate Dadar station on foot because you thought you were Vin Diesel!
normalised: And it's not just two-wheelers. New rules are clamping down on reckless driving too. Speeding in Mumbai will now cost you rupee five thousand, with repeat offenders facing license suspensions. Imagine trying to navigate Dadar station on foot because you thought you were V I N Diesel!

unnormalised: Plus, there's this whole thing about mandatory reflective tapes on trucks and buses driving on NH44 – especially crucial now with all the festival traffic heading home for Onam.
normalised: Plus, there's this whole thing about mandatory reflective tapes on trucks and buses driving on N H forty four – especially crucial now with all the festival traffic heading home for Onam.

unnormalised: Word on the street is, the government aims to cut down accidents by 15% this year. Let's hope these rules are effective and not just a pain in the… bumper. Drive safe, ya'll, and don't let a traffic ticket ruin your festive cheer!
normalised: Word on the street is, the government aims to cut down accidents by fifteen percent this year. Let's hope these rules are effective and not just a pain in the… bumper. Drive safe, ya'll, and don't let a traffic ticket ruin your festive cheer!
